title: Unable to launch the LoL Client - Launch Button does nothing/no EULA showing up to accept
body:
I've experienced a strange bug where when I clicked on the hextech crafting button in the LoL client that it caused it to disappear.
I then tried to relaunch LoL but after clicking on the launch button, nothing happens.

Attempted a repair, deleted some of the RADS files, restarted the PC, run under administrator etc. but nothing seems to work.

Was trying to get some ranked done today but this is ridiculous as I cannot play now.

replies.body:
These definitely sound like symptoms of a poor connection to the League servers. This can typically be remedied by working through the solutions listed in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), so I definitely recommend giving those a try.

Let me know if they resolved your issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7BZ1Mn81,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-08T02:30:27.407+0000)
>
> These definitely sound like symptoms of a poor connection to the League servers. This can typically be remedied by working through the solutions listed in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), so I definitely recommend giving those a try.
> 
> Let me know if they resolved your issue.

I think I figured out something.  Its INCREDIBLY JANKY.
When I try to launch the normal production client, nothing happens.  HOWEVER, if I try to launch the PBE client then switch back to the live prod client, it will launch.  I can actually reproduce this too.  Please look into this.
Hmm... that's pretty weird. How did the steps in the connection guide go?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7BZ1Mn81,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-08T21:45:58.247+0000)
>
> Hmm... that's pretty weird. How did the steps in the connection guide go?

I tried turning off my firewall and turning it back on.  No luck.  I also changed my DNS server to the suggested 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4.  Then flushed the dns.  No luck.  The stupid thing is that I can access the PBE with no issue but not NA live.

Also I ran the hextech tool.  I have the Lol logs if you are interested.

I'd actually recommend attaching those logs to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech specialists can take a look at continue to work with you on this.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7BZ1Mn81,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-13T22:18:52.627+0000)
>
> I'd actually recommend attaching those logs to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech specialists can take a look at continue to work with you on this.

Already did.  Also the PBE client/live client interaction turned out to be a false positive.  I have like only a 10% chance to launch the live client each time I click launch.  It is quite frustrating.  I wish the new live client would come sooner.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7BZ1Mn81,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-08T02:30:27.407+0000)
>
> These definitely sound like symptoms of a poor connection to the League servers. This can typically be remedied by working through the solutions listed in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), so I definitely recommend giving those a try.
> 
> Let me know if they resolved your issue.
